name: Leap Of Faith (darkclaw89)
description:
Your world was invaded by some monters called Love Eaters, you lost your true love now to avoid blindness you will need to go get all your Love Essences. You run against the clock , so Take a Leap of faith and dont go blind

Well the game is playable but with a lack of levels, because I spend too much time on mechanics, maybe  I do some minor levels for it before the end of jam

Controls : 

MOVE : wasd / arrow keys / directional pad

JUMP: SPACE/ Y Button
